 2007-15132007-10-12,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment of THOMAS W. CRYER of Etobicoke, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Post Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending August 22, 2009, in the place of Hassan Khosrowshahi.
